title: Found Phone - Black iPhone 13
description: I found a black iPhone 13 lying on a bench near Lakeview Park. The screen is locked but seems to be working fine. There's a small scratch on the back. Found around 6 PM on Sunday. Please contact me with identifying details.

title: Found Gold Earring - Single Piece
description: Single gold earring found near the grocery entrance in Block C market. It's a small hoop with a gemstone. Found on June 7th morning while shopping. Message me if it's yours with matching details.

title: Found Backpack - Navy Blue
description: A navy blue backpack was left on the Metro Line 3 train. Contains a few notebooks, a water bottle, and a calculator. Found around 10 AM during my commute. Contact me if you can describe what’s inside.

title: Found Child’s Toy - Teddy Bear
description: Small brown teddy bear found near the kids' play area in Sunshine Mall. Looks well-loved, with a red bow tie. Found on June 5th evening. Likely belongs to a child—contact to claim.

title: Found Keys - Car and House
description: Found a keychain with a car key and 2 house keys near the City Stadium entrance. It has a red tag labeled 'D3'. Found around 8 AM on June 4. Let me know if it’s yours with matching details.

title: Found Watch - Silver Fossil
description: Silver Fossil watch discovered on a bench outside Rose Garden Café. It was left early Monday morning. Still ticking and in good condition. Message me with details to confirm ownership.

title: Found Book - 'The Alchemist'
description: Found a paperback copy of 'The Alchemist' by Paulo Coelho at the bus stop near Tech Park. Has sticky notes and a name written inside. Found on June 2nd around noon. Reach out to identify and claim.
